00024 
00025 import oauth2
00026 import imaplib
00027 
00028 
00029 class IMAP4_SSL(imaplib.IMAP4_SSL):
00030     """IMAP wrapper for imaplib.IMAP4_SSL that implements XOAUTH."""
00031 
00032     def authenticate(self, url, consumer, token):
00033         if consumer is not None and not isinstance(consumer, oauth2.Consumer):
00034             raise ValueError("Invalid consumer.")
00035 
00036         if token is not None and not isinstance(token, oauth2.Token):
00037             raise ValueError("Invalid token.")
00038 
00039         imaplib.IMAP4_SSL.authenticate(self, 'XOAUTH',
00040             lambda x: oauth2.build_xoauth_string(url, consumer, token))
